The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14397](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14397.html) (Faster duplicate input check in CheckTransa
@MarcoFalke rebased, clang-formatted, etc.\n\nfailure is unrelated to this PR now (one of the PBST tests)
should be ready to merge now, pending integration tests.\n\nThanks!
nit: there is still trailing whitespace, which prevents this from getting merged. Could do clang-format-diff.py?
Choose another name: `state` is already used in this scope :-)
Make the implicit conversions here explicit :-)\n\nConversion from `uint32_t` to `int64_t` may theoretically alter value, so better make it explicit!
noting this is from existing code in bench/block_assemble.cpp
Please fix this everywhere in the codebase! This is done fairly frequently.
Are you still working on this?
Ah I thought I did this -- I can take care of it soon. \n\nYes, I would like to see this merged
Ah I thought I did this -- I can take care of it soon. \n\nYes, I would like to see this merged

µnit: Could probably use something like `[&] { scheduler.serviceQueue(); }` to avoid `boost::bind`. Or if you prefer bind, use `std::bind`.

```suggestion
        thread_group.create_thread([&] { scheduler.serviceQueue(); });
```
